Being included as a naturalist

on the voyage of the Beagle would prove to be a life-changing event for Darwin. Darwin decided to accept Professor Henslow’s invitation.

However, he ran into opposition from one person whose strong support he needed most-- his father.

You want to

take a trip for

two years?

No,

absolutely

not.

But it’s not just to travel.

of the Beagle
